body:
Comment 4: 
I cannot reproduce this on a darwin/amd64 machine running a recent version of tip. 

This program consumes a lot of runtime but does not abort.

% /usr/bin/time ./x >/dev/null
      113.32 real       111.02 user         2.41 sys
% go version
go version devel +2ca683523bf0 Wed Jan 29 18:18:46 2014 +0400 darwin/amd64

If you can reproduce the failure, please comment on this issue.
_Status changed to **Invalid**._
